title: Light Me Up (feat. The Griswolds)
lyrics:
Can I live in this dimension here with you
Can we get lost forever walking on the moon
'Cause I'm gonna take my time just be here in the moment
Never been down this road before it's all brand new
I feel my heart fall through the floor and into you

And nothing's gonna break my stride, lets just be here in the moment



I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

And I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up baby



And I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up baby



Can I live in this dimension here with you

Can we get lost forever walking on the moon

'Cause I'm gonna take my time and just be here in the moment



Never been down this road before it's all brand new

I feel my heart fall through the floor and into you

And nothing's gonna break my stride, lets just be here in the moment



I love the way you how light me up, yeah you light me up

And I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up

I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up baby



And I love the way how you light me up, yeah you light me up
